articles.title: Closing the vaccination gap | Josep Borrell, European Union High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy/Vice Presi-dent of the European Commission - Business Mirror
articles.description: WE need to close the vaccination gap between advanced economies and developing countries to avoid what Tedros Ghebreyesus, head of the World Health Organization (WHO), has called “vaccination apartheid.” Therefore, we need global multilateral action to increa…

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Soccer-Lingard among six dropped by England from final Euro squad - The Star Online
articles.description: (Reuters) -     England manager Gareth Southgate named four right backs including Trent Alexander-Arnold in his final 26-man squad for the European championship on Tuesday after dropping in-form attacking midfielder Jesse Lingard and five other players.
